COMMENTS: This is config file for the mod list command
MOD_COMMAND is a list of the prefix that is used for command
If viewer type only prefix, it will say list of the mode:
only mods that CUSTOM_MOD_HIDE is not true at CustomModDescriptionConfigs.json
If the CUSTOM_MOD_DESCRIPTION value at CustomModDescriptionConfigs.json of one mod is <NONE>
That mod will parsed as MODS_ONE_MESSAGE_NO_CUSTOM_DEFAULT
else it will parsed as MODS_ONE_MESSAGE_CUSTOM_DEFAULT
separate by MODS_SEPARATOR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
Finally say as format MODS_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
If viewer type the mod name after the prefix (regardless of spaces nor UPPER/lower)
It don't say anything if CUSTOM_MOD_HIDE value is true
If CUSTOM_MOD_DESCRIPTION value is <NONE> parsed as MOD_MESSAGE_NO_CUSTOM_DEFAULT
else parsed as MOD_MESSAGE_CUSTOM_DEFAULT
<T_VIEWER> is the ID of Twitch viewer typed command
<M_LIST> is the parsed list of mods
<M_NAME> is the name of mod
<M_DESC_FULL> is the original description of the mod(that mod-maker wrote)
<M_DESC_CUSTOM> is your custom description that you wrote at CustomModDescriptionConfigs.json
<M_AUTHOR_MAIN> is the first author of the mod
<M_AUTHOR_ALL> is the list of author parsed as [MAKER_1,MAKER_2,...]
<M_CREDIT> is the credit if mod
MOD_ENABLED determine whether use this command. true/false
MOD_ALL_ENABLED determine whether use say all command(without mod name). true/false
MOD_ONE_ENABLED determine whether use say one command(with mod name) true/false
TIMEOUT_GLOBAL is the global cooldown(ms, 1000ms=1second) for this command
TIMEOUT_ALL is the cooldown(ms, 1000ms=1second) for say all command
TIMEOUT_ONE is the cooldown(ms, 1000ms=1second) for say one command, applied for each mod
MAX_LEN is the max length of the description of one mod (2147483647 = infinite)
example of the default, !cm -> @gyeryak @gyeryak Twitch Utils - CUSTOM_DESC(GyeRyak), BaseMod(kiooeht)
example of the default, !cm basemod -> @gyeryak BaseMod: FULL_DESC, [kiooeht, test447]
JSON 문법과 정규식 문법에 유의해주세요
